name: Thin Judgment
description: What am I doing with my life? Here I am, putting miniature paper people into a vacuum tube. Why should I do that, when I can just watch them burn instead?
minimum_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 600 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 700 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
